passive.lne_wizards.everfrost_staff_1: Applies the Freezing effect and stacks freezing ticks after dealing damage.
passive.lne_wizards.everfrost_staff_2: Also applies these effects to close targets.
passive.lne_wizards.netherflame_staff_1: You gain Spell Haste when attacking burning foes.
passive.lne_wizards.netherflame_staff_2: The damage on burning foes is increased by 10%.
passive.lne_wizards.dragon_staff_1: With each damaging spell, you get stronger on the actual target.
passive.lne_wizards.dragon_staff_2: Increasing the Crit Chance & Crit Damage of Arcane Spell Damage.
effect.lne_wizards.arcane_precision.desc: Increasing the Crit Chance & Damage on Arcane Spells the target.
